problems.problem: A sound wave travels at $340\,\text{m/s}$ with a wavelength of $2\,\text{m}$. Find its frequency.
problems.final_answer: The frequency of the sound is $170\,\text{Hz}$.

problems.problem: A sound wave has a frequency of $440\,\text{Hz}$ and a speed of $330\,\text{m/s}$. Find the wavelength.
problems.final_answer: The wavelength of the sound is $0.75\,\text{m}$.

problems.problem: A tuning fork produces a sound of $512\,\text{Hz}$. If the speed of sound is $340\,\text{m/s}$, find the wavelength.
problems.final_answer: The wavelength of the sound is approximately $0.664\,\text{m}$.

problems.problem: A sound wave has a wavelength of $0.85\,\text{m}$ and a frequency of $400\,\text{Hz}$. Find its speed.
problems.final_answer: The speed of the sound is $340\,\text{m/s}$.

problems.problem: The period of a sound wave is $0.002\,\text{s}$. Find its frequency.
problems.final_answer: The frequency of the sound is $500\,\text{Hz}$.

problems.problem: A sound wave travels $1700\,\text{m}$ in $5\,\text{s}$. Find its speed.
problems.final_answer: The speed of the sound is $340\,\text{m/s}$.

problems.problem: A sound has a frequency of $256\,\text{Hz}$ and a wavelength of $1.33\,\text{m}$. Find its speed.
problems.final_answer: The speed of the sound is approximately $340.48\,\text{m/s}$.

problems.problem: A whistle produces a sound with a wavelength of $0.68\,\text{m}$ and a speed of $340\,\text{m/s}$. Find its frequency.
problems.final_answer: The frequency of the sound is $500\,\text{Hz}$.

problems.problem: A sound wave has a frequency of $125\,\text{Hz}$ and a period of $0.008\,\text{s}$. Check if the period matches the frequency.
problems.final_answer: Yes, the period corresponds correctly to a frequency of $125\,\text{Hz}$.

problems.problem: A sound wave travels with a speed of $340\,\text{m/s}$ and frequency of $170\,\text{Hz}$. Find its wavelength.
problems.final_answer: The wavelength of the sound is $2\,\text{m}$.
